link module¶

class link.Link(env, node, resource, properties)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class defining a link between nodes this class contains properties for the link like delay or preference

DELAY = 'delay'¶
__init__(env, node, resource, properties)[source]¶

Creates a link automatically assign a uniqueid to the link :param env: Simpy environment :param node: Node which the link is refered to :param resource: unitary resource used to lock the link :param properties: properties of the link in the graphml that needs to be evaluated

property delay¶

Returns the delay distribution that needs to be used for the link :returns: link delay distribution

property id¶

Returns the link id :returns: id of the link

property node¶

Returns the referenced node :returns: node reference

transmit(msg, delay)[source]¶

Actual transmitting function :param msg: message that needs to be trasfered :param delay: time that needs to be waited before the message arrives to the destination

tx(msg, delay)[source]¶

Transmission function fot the node use this function to trigger a simpy process :param msg: message that needs to be transfered :param delay: delay that needs to be waited
